mapper.select:
SELECT RTN.RSC_RETURN_CODE, RTN.RSC_RETURN_DATE, RTN.RSC_CD_CODE, RTN.RSC_RETURN_VOL, RTN.RSC_RETURN_PRC, RTN.RSC_RETURN_RESN, RTN.RSC_RETURN_REMK,
RSCCODE.RSC_CD_NAME, RSCCODE.RSC_CD_UNIT,
EMP.EMP_NAME
FROM BF_RSC_RETURN RTN LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_RSC_CODE RSCCODE ON RTN.RSC_CD_CODE = RSCCODE.RSC_CD_CODE LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_EMP EMP ON RTN.EMP_ID = EMP.EMP_ID
ORDER BY 1 DESC
